Title: AnimAction
Description: AnimAction is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by GCE,which was released in 1983.

Title: Armor Attack
Description: Armor Attack is an Action game, developed and published by GCE,which was released in 1982.

Title: Art Master
Description: Art Master is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by GCE,which was released in 1983.

Title: Bedlam
Description: Face the toughest challenge yet: rid the infested earth colonies of the bio mechanical menace that threatens mankind's very existence. Take control of a team of crack military robots who know no remorse or mercy, and power your way through 25 massive levels of computer Bedlam!

Title: Berzerk
Description: Maneuver your humanoid through the electrified mazes of robot filled rooms. You many kill off the first group of robots but initial success does not mean survival...future groups begin firing at your! Added danger lurks when Evil Otto enters. He can jump the maze walls and squash you if you linger too long!

Title: Blitz!
Description: Blitz! is a Sports game, developed and published by GCE,which was released in 1982.

Title: Clean Sweep
Description: Evil bank robbers have just blown your bank to smithereens. As bank president, you only hhhave a vacuum available to recover the money strewn among the rubble, before the thieves destroy you! The thieves get increasingly anxious, but for added challenge, turn off the lights of the bank's corridors and gather the money through a blind maze.

Title: Vectrex
Description: Vectrex is a Hardware game, developed by GCE and published by Milton Bradley,which was released in 1982.

Title: Cosmic Chasm
Description: Can you save the galaxy by blowing up the alien-inhabited planet...and get off the planet before you explode too? You must burrow deep inside finding yours way through the underground maze while battling the Planet Protectors. If you can get to the center, plant your one bomb and try to find your way out. It's only a matter of seconds before the planet goes BOOM!

Title: Dark Tower
Description: Dark Tower is an Adventure game, developed by GCE and published by Bootleg,which was cancelled before it was released.

Title: Spinball
Description: Spinball is a Miscellaneous game, developed by GCE and published by Milton Bradley,which was released in 1983.

Title: Flipper Pinball
Description: Spinball is a Miscellaneous game, developed by GCE and published by Milton Bradley,which was released in 1983.

Title: Fortress of Narzod
Description: A long time ago, before our history began, wizards-both good and evil-battled for supremacy for the earth.It was a time of magic and adventure when all men possessed special powers.The most evil wizard, Narzod, gained the power to enslave all mankind.You are the only remaining honorable wizard with the knowledge to harness all the forces of good to defeat Narzod and destroy his sinister fortress.But Narzod has prepared for your approach and guards his realm with deadly creatures of darkness, including the Mystic Hurler.Beware, and approach the Fortress of Narzod with great caution!

Title: Heads-Up
Description: Challenge another player or take on the computer itself in an action-packed soccer game that demands all the concentration, strategy and split second reactions of the real thing. Realistic, dimensional players move the ball down a scrolling field by passing and kicking the ball to each other--just like the actual game.Head Up--all the excitement and challenge at a real soccer tournament complete with the roar of the crowd!

Title: Soccer Football
Description: Challenge another player or take on the computer itself in an action-packed soccer game that demands all the concentration, strategy and split second reactions of the real thing. Realistic, dimensional players move the ball down a scrolling field by passing and kicking the ball to each other--just like the actual game.Head Up--all the excitement and challenge at a real soccer tournament complete with the roar of the crowd!

Title: Hyperchase
Description: Watch out for the guardrail! You're behind the wheel of your formula one racer about to start the world's toughest grand prix. Shift through all four gears as you try to stay alive through city streets and country roads. Fire up your engine--the start lights are counting down!

Title: Melody Master
Description: Enter a remarkable new world of musical entertainment and learning Melody Master™--a unique approach to music composition and education.

Title: MineStorm
Description: MineStorm is an Action game, developed and published by GCE,which was released in 1982.

Title: Pitchers Duel
Description: Pitchers Duel is a Sports game, developed by GCE and published by CGE Services,which was released in 2007.

Title: Polar Rescue
Description: Polar Rescue is an Action game, developed and published by GCE,which was released in 1983.

Title: Pole Position
Description: Qualify for the Grand Prix and win the Pole Position, the number one starting spot. Then go flat out to beat the track record and finish a winner. Features treacherous curves, hair-raising near misses, and all the thrills of the popular video arcade game.

Title: Rip Off
Description: Beware of scavenging pirates trying to steal your precious fuel cells! The more pirates you destroy, the faster their successors become. Guard your tanks carefully...you are always outnumbered!

Title: Scramble
Description: Scramble your fighter and take on the enemy! The base is heavily guarded and you must guide your ship through five levels of enemy defenses before you can destroy your objective.

Title: Heads-Up
Description: Challenge another player or take on the computer itself in an action-packed soccer game that demands all the concentration, strategy and split second reactions of the real thing. Realistic, dimensional players move the ball down a scrolling field by passing and kicking the ball to each other--just like the actual game.Head Up--all the excitement and challenge at a real soccer tournament complete with the roar of the crowd!

Title: Soccer Football
Description: Challenge another player or take on the computer itself in an action-packed soccer game that demands all the concentration, strategy and split second reactions of the real thing. Realistic, dimensional players move the ball down a scrolling field by passing and kicking the ball to each other--just like the actual game.Head Up--all the excitement and challenge at a real soccer tournament complete with the roar of the crowd!

Title: Solar Quest
Description: How many types of alien vessels will you be able to destroy? Seven different types are after you. You must first destroy them and then attempt to rescure the survivors before they float into the sun. Don't get your ship too close to the sun...it's high temperatures can destroy you.

Title: Space Wars
Description: Who says there are no rule in intergalactic warfare. Pick your own--bounce, expanded universe, black hole--as you embark on a deadly dogfight.

Title: Spike
Description: The dastardly villain Spud has kidnapped our heroine, the lovely and oh so innocent Molly, and taken her far away to his secret hideout. 'Eek! Help, Spike!'Spike, our courageous hero and Molly's true love, races to her rescure. He'll be relying on your skills and split-second timing to help him in his quest to save poor Molly. Maneuver Spike through treacherous obstacles and avoid the dangerous creatures along the way to Spud's hideout. If you're successful, Spike can rescure Molly and the two will live happily ever after--that is until Spud strikes again. 'Oh, No!'

Title: Spinball

Title: Star Castle
Description: The legend of the Start Castle is indeed famous--a mysterious fortress in a far away galaxy filled with incredible riches and surrounded by revolving wats of shimmering solid gold. Yet no one, until now, has ever actually seen the Castle--or lived to tell about it!As you approach, you are overwhelmed with the beauty of the Castle but you suddenly realize that the golden wats hide a deadly arsenal. To survive you must destroy the wats and the powerful Energy Cannon they shield. Perhaps you will be the first to survive the Star Castle's arsenal and prove the legend true. Perhaps Not!

Title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
Description: Welcome, Captain Kirk, to your command on the Starship Enterprise. Your mission is to seek out and destroy the enemy Klingon Mothership. Travel through nine sectors of space, each more difficult or take a shortcut through the Black Hole. Be careful...the Klingons and Romulans are hiding in space, waiting to destroy you at every turn!

Title: Starhawk
Description: Fasten your seatbelt...you're the pilot defending the sovereignty of your planet. Don't blink--you might miss one of the alien vessels.

Title: Web Wars
Description: Enter a galaxy of the future filled with adventure and danger--a galaxy unlike any you have imagined before.You became the Hawk King--a crature capable of incredible speed and power--as you attempt to capture the amazing creatures that inhabit the speeding Web of Fantasy. All 20 creatures are protected by guardians and the dreaded Cosmic Dragon and each will become progressively more difficult to capture. No one has ever captured the elusive twentieth creature. Will you?
